title: New: A$AP Rocky – Ridin’ (Feat. Lana Del Rey)
content: So having appeared together in Lana’s recent grossly exuberant video for National Anthem, A$AP Rocky has called in the pouty lipped songstress for an appearance on Ridin’, taken from his upcoming album LongLiveA$AP. As to be expected from A$AP, the beat is slick and deliciously produced, whilst Lana’s vocal sections are as cliched/pronounced as ever. “Pick me up after school/you can be my babe/maybe we can go somewhere go a little crazy” – hardly inspired lyrically, but hey, it’s pop music, right?
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
